### Summary

### Motivation

Why is this refactor necessary?
(e.g., improve readability, reduce duplication, simplify logic, prepare for new features)

### Scope

What parts of the codebase are affected?

- [ ] Files or modules to refactor
- [ ] Related components or dependencies
- [ ] Tests that may need updating

### Current Issues

What’s wrong with the current implementation?

- [ ] Hard to read or maintain
- [ ] Poor performance
- [ ] Violates design patterns
- [ ] Not scalable
- [ ] Other: [describe]

### Refactor Goals

What should the refactored code achieve?

- [ ] Better readability
- [ ] Improved performance
- [ ] Cleaner architecture
- [ ] Easier testing
- [ ] Reduced complexity

### Risks

Any potential side effects or regressions?

- [ ] Might break existing functionality
- [ ] Affects shared components
- [ ] Requires retesting critical flows

### Implementation Notes

Any ideas, patterns, or tools you plan to use?
(e.g., use hooks, extract utility functions, apply DRY/KISS principles)

Low / Medium / High
